ABOUT the 3RWW SEWER ATLAS


The 3RWW Sewer Atlas provides the ability to interact with ALCOSAN regional sewer infrastructure data maintained by 3 Rivers Wet Weather.


This map will help you:

  • get information about specific pieces of infrastructure by selecting them on the map or in a table, or by using predefined search queries
  • trace upstream and downstream from any location, view a summary of tracing results, and download tracing results as table for MS Excel
  • run queries on Point of Connection data.
  • compare sewer data against supplementary data, including Allegheny County parcel data and multiple aerial imagery sources
  • find a location using a specific longitude, latitude or by leveraging the geolocation functionality of your tablet or smartphone
  • save the map as a .pdf or .jpg file


See the help documentation for more detailed information about how to use this map.


You can also view the November 2015 webinar of an overview of the features of the 3RWW Sewer Atlas at http://www.3riverswetweather.org/municipalities/municipal-tools under Municipal Tools >>> 3RWW Sewer Atlas Webinar >>> Using the 3RWW Sewer Atlas.



3RWW Sewer Atlas version 2.0.0 (August 2016) by CivicMapper. Need help with this app? email 3rww@civicmapper.com.
